title: Social Presence Enhancement Strategies in Technology-Enhanced Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Online learning experience and basic job-related competencies
context.additional_context: Process for in-service professionals to acquire effective educational strategies utilizing social presence in a technology-based learning environment centered on smartphones.

learning_goals: Explain three core elements for measuring social presence in technology-based learning environments
Design at least two interaction-promoting strategies among learners using smartphone-based tools (KakaoTalk, Band, etc.)
Complete practical assignments by applying multimedia techniques (images, emoticons, video feedback) to enhance social presence
Apply a five-step process to design collaborative learning environments under LMS constraints

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
